title: Yishi Zhi Zun
synopsis:
Meng Qi, a time-traveler who wants to be a dashing swordsman in white, fails in endless extreme missions in the 'reincarnation space'. The wind suddenly changed and he became the world-famous "Thunder Sword Mad Monk". However, all of this turned out to be the treacherous plan of the ancient power. Let’s look at the invincible and funny little monk who is happy in the world and proud of the three worlds.

(Source: bilibili)
